title: Bulk Activate Windows 10 Extended Security update
description: Automates switching and activating Windows 10 devices to ESU via Intune remediation.

title: TKM UNINSTALLER
description: Command-line software detector and uninstaller for Windows automation (e.g., Intune).

title: Microsoft Store Apps downloader
description: Modern Windows Forms GUI for downloading Microsoft Store packages with all its dependancies.

title: Intune Scripts and Remediation Checker
description: This lightweight EXE provides a modern GUI to simulate Microsoft Intune detection and remediation scripts.

title: Intune Script Compliance Validator
description: PowerShell WinForms tool to validate Microsoft Intune PowerShell scripts, Proactive Remediations (PR) detection/remediation scripts, and Custom Compliance discovery scripts. It highlights common pitfalls and offers optional auto-fixes where safe.

title: Password Expiration Notification
description: GUI-based PowerShell tool that alerts users when passwords are near expiration. Features customizable notifications and automatic password reset capabilities.

title: Powershell Code Signing Gui
description: GUI-based PowerShell tool rgar signs Powershell scripts

title: BitLocker Compliance Checker
description: Evaluates device readiness for BitLocker silent encryption. Checks TPM status, secure boot, and other security requirements.

title: Wallpaper Deployment
description: Deploys custom wallpapers across enterprise devices using Intune. Supports multiple resolutions and automatic scaling.

title: Camera Restriction by Location
description: Enables/disables cameras based on geolocation using PowerShell. Integrates with network detection and security policies.

title: TSS Log Collector
description: Collects TSS logs with Intune Remediation for troubleshooting Microsoft Teams and other services.

title: Software Installer
description: Universal script for installing most software via SCCM. Dynamically fetches latest versions and handles dependencies.

title: Intune Documentation Bot
description: GitHub Actions bot that scrapes Microsoft Intune documentation and tweets updates to keep IT professionals informed.

title: Home Automation Controller
description: IoT tools to monitor electricity usage and control sockets via Arduino and Bluetooth for smart home management.

title: Intune Automation Scripts
description: Comprehensive collection of PowerShell scripts and tools designed to streamline and enhance Microsoft Intune administration tasks. Built from managing over 50k devices.

title: OSDeploy
description: Seamless software installation during MDT/SCCM imaging by dynamically downloading and installing the latest versions from vendors.

title: USBBOOT
description: Fully automated solution for setting up Windows environment with essential applications, Office 365, WiFi configuration, and activation.

title: Chrome Extension
description: AI-powered Chrome extension that creates concise summaries of any webpage content to help users quickly understand information.

title: RLM License Manager
description: Flexible license manager that can be integrated with any software to provide robust licensing and activation capabilities.
